old: 【ヒント：エリア封鎖解放】
column2: [Hint: Area Blockade Released]
speaker: Leo

old: ハイデル関所が開放され、ダウ渓谷とハイデル平原の往来が可能になりました
column2:
The Hidell Checkpoint has been opened, allowing 
passage between the Dowe Valley and the 
Hidell Plains.
speaker: Leo

old:
ドリード城内部は複雑だ
先行している騎士をマーカーで追い、情報を得ていくといい！命の器は地下にあるようだ
column2:
The interior of Dreed Castle is complex. 
It would be good to follow the knights who are 
ahead of you with markers and gather information! 
The Vessel of Life seems to be located underground.
speaker: White Knight

old: 一瞬でいい――
column2: Just for a moment—
speaker: Leo

old:
俺たちが白竜の力を
継承できる程度でかまわない――
column2:
It's okay if we can inherit
just a fraction of the White Dragon's power—
speaker: Leo

old:
それほどに白竜を目覚めさせるには
どうしたらよいのか――
column2:
What should we do to awaken the White Dragon
to such an extent?
speaker: Leo

old:
ジョゼフはアークのことで頭がいっぱいだ
相談したら《ブラッドオーブ》を探せと言われた
おれが抱える焦りが伝わらないんだ
column2:
Joseph is preoccupied with the Ark.
When I consulted him, 
he told me to find the "Blood Orb."
He doesn't seem to sense the urgency I feel.
speaker: Leo

old:
竜の覚醒――
方法は自分たちで探すしかないのか
column2:
Awakening the Dragon--
We'll just have to find a way to do it ourselves.
speaker: Leo

old:
レオが深刻な顔をして
わたしを見ているのです
column2: Leo is looking at me with a serious expression.
speaker: Mysial

old: 何かありましたか？
column2: Did something happen?
speaker: Mysial

old: 白竜様の覚醒はいつか――
column2:
When will the awakening of 
Lord White Dragon occur?
speaker: Mysial

old:
わたしには、時が来たら
としかお答えできません
column2: I can only answer when the time comes.
speaker: Mysial

old:
わたしの仕事は
白竜様の意志を伝えること――
column2:
My job is to convey
the will of Lord White Dragon.
speaker: Mysial

old:
人々の願いの
代弁者ではないのです
column2: I am not the spokesperson for people's desires.
speaker: Mysial

old:
白竜の目を覚ます――
ふん、レオの差し金か
column2:
Waking the white dragon--
Hmm, Leo sent you.
speaker: Joseph

old:
あの眠りで竜力が回復するのだ
その邪魔をするつもりか？
column2:
That sleep restores Dragon Force.
Are you going to interrupt that?
speaker: Joseph

old: 賛成しかねるな
column2: I cannot agree with that.
speaker: Joseph

old: 何より、すべがなかろう
column2: Above all, there's no way to do it.
speaker: Joseph

old:
ねえ――
ゴブリンキングから手に入れた古文書！
あれの解読が終わったんだ
column2:
Hey... I finished deciphering the ancient 
document we obtained from the Goblin King!
speaker: Klaus

old: 竜の石化を解く方法を見つけたと思う
column2:
I think I've found a way to undo the 
petrification of the dragon.
speaker: Klaus

old: 試してみるかい？
column2: Would you like to give it a try?
speaker: Klaus

old:
もし、その気があったら
これから《ドリード城》へ向かってほしい
column2:
If you're feeling up to it, 
I want you to head towards Dreed Castle.
speaker: Klaus

old:
昔々、白騎団の本拠地だったところでね
今は色々な物の保管庫になっている
column2:
Once upon a time, 
it was the stronghold of the White Knights.
Now, it has become a storage facility 
for various items.
speaker: Klaus

old:
そうそう、今回の古文書だって元々は
ドリード城に保管されていたものだ
column2:
Oh, that's right. Even this ancient document was 
originally stored in Dreed Castle.
speaker: Klaus

old:
いや、保管というよりは
封じたという言い方が正しいかな
あそこには世に出ては困るものが
いっぱいある
column2:
No, I think it's more accurate to say that it was 
sealed. 
There are a lot of things there that shouldn't 
be released into the world.
speaker: Klaus

old:
というわけで、今回ばかりはジョゼフ様には
絶対秘密にして欲しい
column2:
So, this time, I really need you to 
keep this a secret from Joseph.
speaker: Klaus

old:
じゃあ、それぞれこっそり出発して、現地集合だ
これは城で使う鍵――
中できっと必要になるから渡しておくよ
column2:
Well then, let's each secretly depart and 
meet up at the destination. 

This is the key used in the castle. 

I'm giving it to you because we'll 
definitely need it inside.
speaker: Klaus

old: ええと、あとは――
column2: Um, as for the rest...
speaker: Klaus

old:
そうそう、レオには君から話してほしい
また勝手な行動か、と思われたくないからね
column2:
Oh, that's right. I want Leo to hear it from you. 
I don't want him to think I'm acting selfishly.
speaker: Klaus

old:
レオへの報告を忘れないでくれよ
そして《ドリード城》で会おう！
column2:
Don't forget to report to Leo
and let's meet at Dreed Castle!
speaker: Klaus

old: 白竜の目を覚ます方法があれば――
column2: If there is a way to awaken the White Dragon...
speaker: Leo

old:
ほう――クラウスとおまえでなんとかするだと？
《ドリード城》へ行く？
column2:
Well... you and Klaus are going to work it out, 
aren't you?
Go to Dreed Castle?
speaker: Leo

old:
わかった
しかし《ドリード城》への道中にある関所は
このところ厳しく通行を制限しているんだ
column2:
Understood. 
However, the checkpoints along the way to 
Dreed Castle have recently been 
enforcing strict travel restrictions.
speaker: Leo

old:
よし、いいだろう――
おれが通達を出しておく
しかし、手助けはそこまでだ
あとは自分の才覚で切り抜けてくれ
column2:
Alright, fine――
I will issue the order.
However, I can only assist you up to that point.
The rest is up to your own talent to overcome.
speaker: Leo

old:
クラウスが何を考えているか知らないが――
期待して待たせてもらうよ
column2:
I don't know what Klaus is thinking, 
but I'll wait with anticipation.
speaker: Leo

old: ――あんたが通達に名前のあった覚者か
column2:
Are you the Arisen whose name 
was mentioned in the order?
speaker: Josh

old:
もちろん通行は許可するが、ここから先は
魔物の数、そして強さが段違いだ
心して進んでくれよ
column2:
Of course, we will allow your passage.
But beyond this point, the number and strength of 
the enemies are on a completely different level. 
Proceed with caution.
speaker: Josh

old:
ドリードはかつて騎士団の本拠地だった城だ
その頃の、古い見取り図を頼りに
先行隊が奥へ向かっている
column2:
Dreed was once the castle that served as the 
headquarters of the Knights' Order. 
The advance party is now heading deeper into the 
castle, relying on an old blueprint from that time.
speaker: White Knight

old: 彼らの居場所を目印に追うといいだろう
column2:
You might want to follow their 
whereabouts as a landmark.
speaker: White Knight

old:
覚者よ、注意しろ
内部は魔物だらけの上に――
column2:
Arisen, be cautious.
For the depths are filled with nothing but enemies -
speaker: White Knight

old:
地下牢や水路で相当複雑だ
道を間違えると、どこに出るかわからんぞ
column2:
The underground dungeons and waterways 
are quite complex. 
If you take the wrong path, 
you won't know where you'll end up.
speaker: White Knight

old:
覚者よ、この螺旋階段を下るんだ
２階層下に礼拝堂に続く通路がある
column2:
Arisen, descend this spiral staircase.
There is a passage leading to the chapel 
two floors below.
speaker: White Knight

old:
目的のモノがあるとしたら、最深部の
旧礼拝堂――団長がそう言っていた
column2:
If there's something you're looking for, 
it's in the deepest part of the old chapel - 
that's what the Commander said.
speaker: White Knight

old:
何があるのかまでは
俺は聞かされてないけどな
column2: I haven't been told what exactly is there.
speaker: White Knight

old:
ああ覚者さん！　やっときてくれたか
どうやらその扉の先が礼拝堂らしい
column2:
Ah, Ser Arisen! You've finally arrived I see. 
It seems that beyond that door is the chapel.
speaker: White Knight

old:
鍵はないし、魔物は多いし
まったくどうしようかと思ったよ
column2:
There are no keys, and there are many enemies.
I really didn't know what to do.
speaker: White Knight

old: さぁ、今度はあんたが先導してくれ
column2: Now, it's your turn to lead the way.
speaker: White Knight

old: 押せ押せ！　斬り込め！
column2: Push, push!　Cut it down!
speaker: Gerd

old: 退くな！　ひるむな！
column2: Do not retreat!　Don't flinch!
speaker: Gerd

old: 白騎団！　覚者に負けるな！
column2: White Knights! Don't lose to the Arisen!
speaker: Gerd

old: 弱点を見極めろ！
column2: Find the weakness!
speaker: Gerd

old: 見ろ、虫の息だ！
column2: Look, it's on its last legs!
speaker: Gerd

old: あとひと押し！
column2: One more push!
speaker: Gerd

old: こ、こんな怪物ははじめてだ！
column2: This is the first time I've beheld such a monster!
speaker: White Knight

old: 無茶だよ、こんなの！
column2: This is absurd, I can't believe this!
speaker: White Knight

old: くっ――手強い！
column2: Hngh... This is tough!
speaker: White Knight

old: くそ――負けるか――
column2: Damn... I won't lose...
speaker: White Knight

old:
ドリード城から命の器を持ち帰って――
その中には魔物の命を詰め込んで
竜に捧げればいいんじゃないか
column2:
Bring back the Vessel of Life from Dreed Castle...
Fill it with the life force of slain monsters and 
offer it to the Dragon.
speaker: Klaus

old: 僕が考えていたのはそういうことで――
column2: That's what I was thinking--
speaker: Klaus

old:
器が仲間たちの命でいっぱいになるなんて
思ってもいなかったんだ
やりきれないよ――
column2:
I never imagined the vessel would be filled 
with the lives of my comrades.
It's unbearable—
speaker: Klaus

old: ドリード城での出来事は聞いた
column2: I heard about the events at Dreed Castle.
speaker: Joseph

old:
その器に詰まっているのは
敵、味方の命――失われた命であることもな
column2:
The vessel is filled with lives,
both enemy and ally—lives that were lost.
speaker: Joseph

old:
なるほど、その命を捧げれば白竜の石化は
止まり、意識も明瞭になるのかもしれない
column2:
I see. So offering those lives might stop the 
White Dragon's petrification and 
restore its consciousness.
speaker: Joseph

old:
しかし、その方法は――
このレスタニアが３００年前に捨てた
忌まわしき知恵の産物なのだ
column2:
However, this method... is the product of the 
detestable wisdom that Lestania abandoned 
300 years ago.
speaker: Joseph

old:
わたしは――賛成できない
しかし、反対もしない
column2:
I cannot agree.
But also, I do not oppose it.
speaker: Joseph

old:
失われた命と言ったが――
白竜に捧げることでその命は生き続けるとも
いえるのかもしれない
column2:
But perhaps it can be said that by dedicating it 
to the White Dragon, 
those lost lives will continue to live on.
speaker: Joseph

old:
それを思うと――反対するわけには
いかないのだ
column2: When I think about it--I can't disagree.
speaker: Joseph

old:
この戦いで命を落とした部下たちのために――
貴殿も祈ってやってくれ
column2:
For my subordinates who lost 
their lives in this battle—
please pray for them as well.
speaker: Gerd

old: 白竜――目覚めるかな？
column2: White Dragon――Will you awaken?
speaker: Iris

old:
おれが求めたことにはこれほどの代償が
必要だというのか――？
column2:
Is this the price that must be paid for what I 
have sought after?
speaker: Leo

old: 求めてはいけなかったのか――
column2: Was it something we shouldn't have searched for?
speaker: Leo

old:
よく、考えましたか？
皆と相談しましたか？
column2:
Have you thought carefully?
Have you discussed it with everyone?
speaker: Mysial

old: その器の中身を白竜様に捧げる――
column2:
I offer the contents of this vessel 
to Lord White Dragon.
speaker: Mysial

old:
その是非、今一度考えた上で
よろしければ、器をわたしに――
column2:
Please consider this once more, and if you're 
still willing, give me the Vessel.
speaker: Mysial

old: 準備できたら声を掛けてくれ
column2: Give me a shout when you're ready.
speaker: Leo

old:
一緒にやりたいこと、相談したいこと――
頼みたいことが山ほどある
column2:
There are so many things I want to do with you, 
things I want to talk to you about-- 
so much I want to ask you for help with.
speaker: Leo

old:
【ヒント：ダウ渓谷について】
ジンゲンの村には強力な装備品を扱う店があります
ドリード城へ向かう際には、戦力を強化して向かいましょう
column2:
[Hint: About Dowe Valley]
In the village of Jingen, 
there is a shop that sells powerful equipment.

Before heading to Dreed Castle, 
strengthen your forces.
speaker: Leo
